thread.title: Christina Milian flaunts her toned pins in thigh-grazing mini dress as she attends star-studded fashion launch - Daily Mail
thread.title_full: Christina Milian flaunts her toned pins in thigh-grazing mini dress as she attends star-studded fashion launch - Daily Mail

title: Christina Milian flaunts her toned pins in thigh-grazing mini dress as she attends star-studded fashion launch - Daily Mail
text: Share 186 shares Adding to her kooky look, she accessorised her ensemble with a clear perspex clutch that featured a red purse and hinted at her mobile phone. The music darling injected height into her look with a pair of quirky red suede heels with buckle detail that paraded her toned pins. Fashion forward: Putting her best fashion foot forward, Christina slipped into a thigh-grazing T-shirt dress which featured a number of flags and emblems from countries all around the world Work it: Adding to her kooky look, she accessorised her ensemble with a clear perspex clutch that featured a red purse and hinted at her mobile phone Picture perfect: The 35-year-old hitmaker exhibited her toned pins as she posed for pictures with pal and WAG star Nicole Williams She worked her raven locks into chic chignon, displaying her statement drop earrings at the star-studded bash. But while she is a regular on the Hollywood social circuit, the early 2000s chart star is also making something of a professional comeback. She recently starred in the Rocky Horror Picture reboot on Fox as Magenta, the role made famous by Patricia Quinn, alongside Laverne Cox, Victoria Justice, Adam Lambert and Tim Curry. Man of the moment: A$AP Rocky appeared in high spirits as he debut his new collaboration with GUESS Tee time: Clad in the brand's logo tee, he teamed his look with a denim jacket, blue trousers and an eye-catching orange wool hat with tiger design Party people: GUESS Co-Founder and Chief Creative Officer Paul Marciano (L) and A$AP Rocky Camera readyt: The rapper wrapped his arm around the CCO during the star-studded bash And the TV actress says she's working on releasing another album sometime this year. She has also attempted a foray into the world of reality TV, via her family show Turned Up. Aside from making heads-turning in her thigh-skimming look, man of the moment A$AP Rocky appeared in high spirits as he debut his new collaboration with GUESS. Clad in the brand's logo tee, he teamed his look with a denim jacket, blue trousers and an eye-catching orange wool hat with tiger design. Style maven: Kendall Jenner stepped out in support for her rumoured beau's new venture clad in a chic pinstriped white blazer Nice to PVC you: The vintage inspired piece was teamed with her pvc trousers Stepping out: The supermodel teamed her look with her comfy white trainers alongside her singer pal Justine Skye Ride on: Later in the evening, she got behind the wheel with her popstar pal Floral first: Amber Rose flaunted her womanly curves in a tummy teasing floral top Step to it! The beauty teamed her look with a black denim jean and Mary-Jane inspired heel The music star is continuing to expand his partnership with Guess with an exciting pop-up shop in Los Angeles. His retail collaboration called The Clubhouse will take to the city of Angels this weekend and will take on a nineties theme with the help of arcade games, a photo booth and treats from yesteryear. Arriving later to the bash was A$AP's rumoured other half Kendall Jenner, the supermodel was joined by Amber Rose and singer Justine Skye. Work it! Jill Wallace (L) and Racquel Natasha flaunted their toned stomach in their crop tops Denim days: Singer Justine Skye (L) and model Kristianna Schlesinger (R) slipped into the brand's denim Denim darlings: Australia's Next Top Model star Simone Holtznagel (L) and model Samantha Hoopes posed for pictures at the bash Pin-credible: Model Hailee Lautenbach and India Love (R) showcased their honed pins in their form-fitting denim looks Sweet tooth: Models Gina Corrigan (L) and Joy Corrigan enjoyed some sweet treats at the bash Check himout: Record producer Don Benjamin sported a red flannel shirt for the bash The crew: RHOBH Lisa Rinna's daughters Delilah and Amelia Hamlin appeared at the bash Share or comment on this article 186
